Header: 97kg of Kerala Ganja discovered from Mayiladi sea â€“ Sri Lanka Navy
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st):- The Sri Lanka Navy has discovered a haul of over 97 kg of Kerala Ganja during a patrol conducted in the sea area close to Mayiladi, Jaffna. The haul of Kerala Ganja was discovered upon inspecting a couple of suspicious parcels that were floating in the sea. The haul of KG has been handed over to the Police STF in Jaffna for onward investigations.
